item.title: cocos2d-x 2.1.5 jsb 读取 plist
item.description: static JSBool js_cocos2dx_CCFileUtils_createDictionaryWithContentsOfFile(JSContext *cx, uint32_t argc, jsval *vp) { jsval *argv = JS_ARGV(cx, vp); JSBool ok = JS_TRUE; JSObject *obj = JS_THIS_OBJECT(cx, vp); js_proxy_t *proxy = jsb_get_js_proxy(obj); cocos2d::CCFileUtils* cobj = (cocos2d::CCFileUtils *)(proxy ? proxy->ptr : NULL); JSB_PRECONDITION2( cobj, cx, JS_FALSE, "Invalid Native Object"); if (argc == 1) { std::string arg0; ok &= jsval_to_std_string(cx, argv[0], &arg0;); JSB_PRECONDITION2(ok, cx, JS_FALSE, "Error processing arguments"); cocos2d::CCDictionary* ret = CCDictionary::createWithContentsOfFile(arg0.c_str()); jsval jsret; jsret = ccdictionary_to_jsval(cx, ret); JS_SET_RVAL(cx, vp, jsret); return JS_TRUE; } JS_ReportError(cx, "wrong number of arguments: %d, was expecting %d", argc, 1); return JS_FALSE; }
